formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'SET' =-
[Syntax] SET(<varname>=[<value>])
[Synopsis] SET assigns a value to a channel variable
[Description] Not available
